clearcontrol.core.device.openclose

Interface OpenCloseDeviceInterface

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CameraDeviceInterface, FilterWheelDeviceInterface, GuiInterface, LaserDeviceInterface, OpticalSwitchDeviceInterface, OptoMechDeviceInterface, SignalGeneratorInterface, StackCameraDeviceInterface<Q>, StageDeviceInterface, TemperatureSensorDeviceInterface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AcquisitionStateManager, AdaptiveEngine, ArduinoOpticalSwitchDevice, AsynchronousPoolStackProcessorPipeline, AsynchronousStackProcessorPipeline, CameraDeviceBase, ClearCLStackProcessorBase, CoboltLaserDevice, ECC100StageDevice, FilterWheelDeviceBase, FilterWheelDeviceSimulator, FLIFilterWheelDevice, GS16AO64cSignalGenerator, HamStackCamera, LaserDeviceBase, LaserDeviceSimulator, LasertHubDevice, LoopTaskDevice, MicroscopeBase, MicroscopeGUI, NIRIOSignalGenerator, OmicronLaserDevice, OpenCloseDeviceAdapter, OpticalSwitchDeviceSimulator, OptoJenaFiberSwitchDevice, PeriodicLoopTaskDevice, PositionDeviceBase, QueueableVirtualDevice, ScalingAmplifierBaseDevice, ScalingAmplifierSimulator, SerialDevice, SignalGeneratorBase, SignalGeneratorSimulatorDevice, SignalStartStopDevice, SIM900MainframeDevice, SIM983ScalingAmplifierDevice, SimulationManager, SMC100StageDevice, Stack2DDisplay, Stack3DDisplay, StackCameraDeviceBase, StackCameraDeviceSimulator, StackProcessorBase, StackRecyclerManager, StageDeviceBase, StageDeviceSimulator, StageHubDevice, TaskDevice, TC01, TemperatureSensorDeviceBase, TemperatureSensorDeviceSimulator, TimelapseBase, TSTStageDevice, UpdatableDevice, VirtualDevice

    public interface OpenCloseDeviceInterface
    Open and close device interface. Devices that implement this interface can be opened and closed. The semantics for opening and closing devices correspond to the allocation and deallocation of long term resources. For example the initialization of a hardware communication channel, or the allocation of large amounts of memory.
    Author:
    royer

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Closes device.
      boolean open()
      Opens device.
